name: DON'T YOU WANT TO KISS ME?
description:
Friday. 11:43 PM.

Nozomi and her date walk home slowly from the bar, hand in hand, both of them feeling quite drunk under the pale cloudy sky.

As they reach her front door, still holding his warm hand, Nozomi turns to face the shy young man who treated her to such a lovely evening.

But he avoids her gaze, nervously staring down at her shoes.

She places her delicate, soft hands upon his shoulders, and he shivers ...

"What's wrong? Don't you want to kiss me goodnight?"

"I... I... uh-uhmm..." he stammers... 

His hazy, intoxicated eyes still fixed upon her dainty little feet.

"Come on ... it's okay ... I won't bite! Kiss me."

He gulps silently, and raises his heavy eyes to meet hers ... 

Finally feeling ready ... for his first ever kiss.

But what the young man sees standing in front of him is no longer the cute, pretty girl he just took out for a few quiet drinks.

He tries to scream, but all he can muster is a low and painful moan ...

... the miserable sound is instantly cut short as Nozomi devours his head.

And then quickly drags his twitching, blood-spattered body through the entrance way to her dark and empty lair.

-------
